name: OvG
description:
This game is in development.

Input:
W,  A, S, D - Move
I - Open / close inventory
M - Open / close big map
E - Item to inventory
RMB (item) - More
Middle Mouse Scroll (item_more) - Up down selection
F - Get in / out auto
L - Оpen / close auto
2 (car) -  Start a car
H (car) -  Turn on / off the light
